name: Cat Burglar (IrishGingy)
description: You need the cats. You can't stop hearing the scratching, the clawing, the pleading for your help! The cats need you. Use your psychic powers (given to you by the cats of course), to see guards through walls. Careful though, using your powers too long can cause you to have a sensory overload! Now go steal some cats from your grandma! She's getting old, she probably won't even notice they are gone . . .
